avdta.gui.editor.visual.rules

Class LinkDataRule

  • java.lang.Object
    • avdta.gui.editor.visual.rules.LinkRule
      • avdta.gui.editor.visual.rules.LinkDataRule
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable

    public class LinkDataRule
extends LinkRule
    The LinkDataRule draws Links based on an associated LinkDataSource. The LinkDataSource provides some data, which is compared with user-specified minimum and maximum values. Using this data, corresponding width and fill colors are selected. Note that the LinkDataRule matches every Link.
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
